title: World nuclear power consumption by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of nuclear power consumption in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Share of nuclear power consumption and Japan has the lowest Share of nuclear power consumption.
The highest Country United States has 29.6 more Share of nuclear power consumption than the lowest Country Japan.
